app.title: MyTunes : AI Music Generator
app.description:
ðŸŽ¶ MyTunes â€“ The Ultimate AI Music Creator ðŸŽ¶

Ever dreamed of making your own music? MyTunes brings your musical ideas to life in just seconds! 

Whether you're an aspiring artist or just want to have fun, our AI-powered tools make music creation effortless, exciting, and limitless.

ðŸ”¥ Instant AI Song Creation
Turn your thoughts into fully produced songs with AI Song Generator! Simply describe what you want, pick a style, and let AI compose an original track just for you. Explore multiple genres:

âœ” AI Rap Song Generator â€“ Create viral-worthy rap tracks
âœ” AI Pop Song Generator â€“ Produce radio-ready pop hits
âœ” AI Rock Song Generator â€“ Craft epic rock anthems
âœ” And so much more!

ðŸŽ¤ Transform Your Voice with AI Magic

Sound like a pro with AI Voice Generator
Experiment with different vocal styles using the Voice Changer App
Enhance your singing with AI Singing â€“ perfect pitch, every time!
ðŸŽ¼ Reimagine Music with AI Covers & Remixing

Revive your favorite songs with the AI Music Cover feature
Personalize your sound with Custom Voice Covers
Generate stunning music covers in seconds with Music Cover Maker
ðŸŽµ Text to Song â€“ Convert Words into Music
Got lyrics but no melody? Our AI-powered Text to Song feature transforms your words into professionally arranged songs in any style.

ðŸŽ¶ Create Like a Pro â€“ No Experience Needed!
MyTunes is designed for both beginners and professionals. Whether youâ€™re creating beats, producing full songs, or experimenting with AI music tools, youâ€™ll have everything you need to compose radio-quality tracks with zero effort!

ðŸš€ Why MyTunes?
âœ” AI-powered Song Generator to create tracks in any genre
âœ” Custom AI Covers to transform existing songs into new masterpieces
âœ” Professional-quality sound â€“ no studio needed!
âœ” Instant AI music composition in just a few taps
âœ” Fun & easy-to-use interface for everyone

ðŸŽ¹ Join the Future of Music Creation!
With MyTunes, music creation is no longer limited to professionals. Now, anyone can compose, remix, and personalize songs like never before. Whether you're looking to make an AI-generated song, craft a unique AI cover, or explore new sounds, MyTunes is your go-to music app.

ðŸŽ¶ Unleash Your Inner Musician!
Music is more than just soundâ€”itâ€™s an expression of who you are. With MyTunes, you can explore endless possibilities, from composing original songs to transforming your voice with AI. Whether you're creating beats, fine-tuning covers, or experimenting with new styles, AI music technology empowers you to produce tracks that sound exactly the way you imagine. Let your creativity run wild! ðŸŽµ

ðŸ“© Got feedback or questions?
Weâ€™d love to hear from you! Contact us at support@aimusicapp.org

ðŸ”— Terms & Privacy Policy

Privacy Policy: https://aimusicapp.org/privacy

ðŸŽµ Download MyTunes today and start creating the music of your dreams! ðŸŽµ

ðŸŽ§ Push Your Creativity Further!
With MyTunes, youâ€™re not just making musicâ€”youâ€™re creating an experience. Whether youâ€™re remixing your favorite songs, crafting original melodies, or using AI Voice Changer to experiment with new sounds, the possibilities are endless. Want to sound like your favorite artist? Or maybe try an unexpected genre? With AI-powered tools at your fingertips, your creativity has no limits. Explore, experiment, and take your music to the next levelâ€”only with MyTunes!

This app uses a foreground service to provide continuous music playback, even when the app is running in the background. A persistent music player is displayed while the music is playing where users can stop the playback.

app.summary: Create your Songs. Cover Maker with any Voice, Song Generator

reviews.text: Will rate better if my problem gets fixed. Spent like $5 for the "free" trial, but wasn't expecting to have to pay another $5 for your own vocals. I said cool, alright I'll pay this'll be fun. Nope. Paid, made song, song was never created and no new vocals created. Still took the money though. I went to create another song, just normal radome generated song. It was made in less than a minute. So what did I pay ANOTHER $5 for?Don't care about the price but after that... feels like a scam.

False advertising and it barely works. Says it's free, it's not. Your first song is, and then the app is entirely useless unless you pay them weekly. Asking for a weekly subscription cost shouldn't even be legal, so I'll absolutely never agree to that. The quality of the songs that generate are barely worth $1 a month, let alone $30

absolute trash, I don't know how this thing has gotten as much of a rating as it has. it stops creating new songs even after I purchased the subscription to get everything unlocked .. for the first couple of songs that generated fine and actually work good songs but after that creating anything goes is nearly impossible... contact support? there's no such thing with this app even has a Discord that no support replies or updates. and everyone on their seems to have the same issue

I wouldn't recommend this. Little to no customization. Also charged my card for a custom voice (my own) just to see if it would work, and it took my money, but didn't actually do anything... so I got scammed there. Thanks for taking over $10 and being completely useless though. I'll take my losses and invest in better software instead. Definition of you get the quality you pay for.

I am paying $6.99 a week for this subscription. Sometimes when I download lyrics for them to create a song, this DJ voice comes in the middle of the song saying,'Pay for your experience, this song is created free by Sono'. What the heck 28.00 a month is not free! I write a lot of poetry and so I'm putting them to music. It's fun, but I am so annoyed by this DJ voice interjecting in the middle telling me to pay for a subscription. This needs to be fixed ASAP or I will cancel my subscription!

Update: NOW they're CHARGING for song creations-- in-app purchases! I purchased an annual subscription for My Tunes AI Music Generator and have been extremely disappointed. After a few weeks of limited functionality, the app stopped working entirely, showing an error message about high capacity. This rendered it useless. Support has been unhelpful; I've faced delivery failures on my messages and been redirected repeatedly, which is unacceptable. I urge potential users, save your money!
reviews.replyText: Hello! We are sorry to hear that you are having troubles with MyTunes. Can you please contact us with this review at store@aimusicapp.org so we may assist you further? We hope to speak with you soon!

reviews.text: DISAPPOINTED I subscribed to MyTunes and was impressed by the music it created for my lyricsâ€”amazing quality! However, after one week, I got an error message saying the app was overloaded. It has now been two weeks, and I still can't use it. Daily attempts result in the same message. I paid for an annual subscription but can't access the service. Please fix this issue quickly, or I'll need to request a refund. The app is brilliant when it worksâ€”donâ€™t let this ruin it!"

I downloaded MyTunes AI Cover, paying $6.99 for a weekâ€™s access under the assumption that I would have full use of the app. Thatâ€™s not the case. After paying the initial fee, I discovered that if I wanted to use my own voice to create an AI coverâ€”a feature I assumed would be includedâ€”I had to pay an additional $4.99. Feeling duped, I reluctantly paid, only for the feature to not work at all. To add insult to injury, when I restarted the app to troubleshoot, I was prompted to pay another $4.99 t

Trash! I should've known better. Don't waste your time with this one! Not only is it false advertising but it doesn't do anything at all. Your voice is recorded and then they say after 30 minutes you can use ai to do a cover song to which they charge an extra fee. Then, they don't deliver but they've charged your account and taken your money and you get nothing. They are robbing people, again, DON'T DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!!

Was awesome to start. Went pro, and even purchased a second voice to work with. But I had issues with that 2nd voice at the start, which they took care of. Then, had an update, after installation, I lost both voices that were purchased. Notifications were sent to support, never heard back, out of voices as well as the funds. Since the update, not only are my purchased voices gone, but now the app isn't working properly, even after re-installing. Unsubscribed, and sadly,going to look elsewhere.

app.AIReview:
MyTunes : AI Music Generator â€“ A Detailed Review

Overview

MyTunes: AI Music Generator is an entertainment app designed to democratize music creation by leveraging artificial intelligence. With over 2,108,026 installs and a solid 4.45-star rating (based on 127,643 user reviews), the app has found a significant audience eager to experiment with AI-generated melodies. The core premise â€“ transforming textual descriptions into complete songs â€“ is undeniably appealing, particularly for individuals lacking formal musical training or access to expensive production tools. The â€˜Freeâ€™ price point further contributes to its accessibility and encourages widespread experimentation. However, like any nascent technology, MyTunes presents both exciting potential and notable limitations that users should carefully consider before diving in.

Key Features

  • AI Song Generator: This is the app's flagship feature. Users input a description of their desired song â€“ specifying genre, mood, instrumentation, and even lyrical themes (though lyrics are currently limited). The AI then generates an original track based on these parameters.
  • Genre Exploration: The app boasts support for a surprisingly diverse range of genres including Pop, Rock, Hip-Hop, Electronic, Classical, Jazz, Country, and more. While the quality varies across genres, the breadth of options is commendable.
  • Cover Maker (with Voice): Users can upload their own audio or utilize pre-recorded voice samples to â€˜coverâ€™ existing AI-generated tracks. This adds a layer of personalization and allows users to create unique vocal arrangements.
  • Song Editing Tools: Basic editing functionality exists, including trimming sections, adjusting tempo, and basic volume control â€“ though these are currently quite rudimentary.
  • Multiple Generation Options: The app offers several generation attempts for each input, allowing users to sift through various iterations until they find a track that aligns with their vision.

Strengths

  • Ease of Use: MyTunesâ€™ intuitive interface is arguably its biggest strength. The AI Song Generator requires minimal technical expertise; even a complete novice can produce a song within minutes. The step-by-step process â€“ description, genre selection, generation â€“ is clearly presented and easy to navigate.
  • Accessibility: The â€˜Freeâ€™ model removes the financial barrier to entry, allowing anyone to experiment with AI music creation without upfront investment. This fosters creativity and encourages exploration.
  • Novelty Factor: The concept of generating music purely through text prompts is inherently captivating. It taps into a desire for creative expression, regardless of musical skill level. The sheer variety of generated tracks provides an endless source of inspiration.
  • Large User Base: The impressive install count (2,108,026) indicates significant demand and suggests that the appâ€™s core concept resonates with a substantial audience. A large community also implies active development and ongoing improvements.

Areas for Improvement

  • Song Quality Variance: The quality of the generated music is inconsistent. Some tracks are surprisingly polished and engaging, while others sound noticeably artificial or disjointed. This variability stems from the current limitations of AI music generation algorithms.
  • Limited Editing Capabilities: The current editing tools are extremely basic. More advanced features like EQ, compression, and effects processing would significantly enhance user control and allow for greater refinement of the generated tracks.
  • Lyrical Constraints: The lack of full lyrical support is a significant drawback. While users can influence the thematic elements, the AI doesn't generate actual lyrics â€“ forcing users to either rely on existing text or manually input them (which defeats the purpose).
  • Lack of Export Options: Currently, users can only save generated tracks within the app itself. The ability to export songs in standard audio formats (MP3, WAV) would dramatically increase their utility and allow for sharing across various platforms.
  • AI "Hallucinations": The AI occasionally produces musical elements that don't logically fit the input parameters â€“ jarring transitions or instrumentation choices that feel random.

User Experience

The user experience is generally positive, driven largely by the appâ€™s simplicity. The clean interface and straightforward workflow make it easy to get started. However, navigating the different generation options can occasionally feel cluttered, especially when multiple attempts are being explored simultaneously. The visual feedback during generation â€“ a simple progress bar â€“ could be enhanced with more detailed information about the AI's processing. Furthermore, the appâ€™s performance is somewhat variable; generating songs can sometimes be slow depending on device specifications and internet connectivity.

Value for Money

Given its â€˜Freeâ€™ price point, MyTunes provides exceptional value in terms of experimentation. The core functionality â€“ the AI Song Generator â€“ is fully accessible without any financial commitment. While a premium subscription offering advanced features (like expanded editing tools and higher-quality audio output) could be considered in the future, the current free version offers sufficient functionality for casual users and aspiring musicians.

Conclusion

MyTunes: AI Music Generator represents an exciting step forward in democratizing music creation. Its ease of use and accessibility make it a compelling tool for anyone interested in exploring the potential of AI-generated music. However, itâ€™s crucial to manage expectations â€“ the quality of output is currently inconsistent, and limitations exist in terms of editing capabilities and lyrical support. Despite these drawbacks, MyTunes is a worthwhile download, particularly for those seeking a fun and innovative way to experiment with musical ideas. The app's future success hinges on continued development and refinement of its AI algorithms and features, addressing the current quality inconsistencies and expanding the creative possibilities offered to users. Itâ€™s a promising tool that, with further investment, could genuinely transform how people approach music creation.
